parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause the brake pedal to become hard, leading to reduced braking performance, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: the brake pedal is difficult to press
the brakes operate but with reduced performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the direct ignition cassette can cause the vehicle to be hard to start, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle is hard to start
and may have a faulty ignition cassette.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose functionality, leading to inconvenience and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle can only drive in reverse
the transmission fails to engage properly

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical wiring harness can cause a fire under the hood, resulting in damage to the vehicle and potentially spreading to the surrounding area, posing a risk to the occupants and nearby property.
symptoms: Flames or smoke emanating from under the hood
melting of wires or electrical components
sparks or arcing from the wiring harness.
